scripts.start: node -r dotenv/config -e "require('dotenv').config({ path: '.env.local' }); require('ejs').renderFile('public/index.ejs', process.env, {}, (err, str) => { if (err) throw err; require('fs').writeFileSync('public/index.html', str); });" && react-scripts start
scripts.build: node -r dotenv/config -e "require('dotenv').config({ path: '.env.local' }); require('ejs').renderFile('public/index.ejs', process.env, {}, (err, str) => { if (err) throw err; require('fs').writeFileSync('public/index.html', str); });" && react-scripts build
